channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19317] Handle schema evolution from int like types to decimal
item.description: If int like type is changed to decimal on parquet data, select results in errors.
item.summary: Handle schema evolution from int like types to decimal

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
